Package fr.sorbonne_u.exceptions

Contract-oriented exceptions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InvariantChecking
    The class InvariantChecking implements helper methods to check invariants in objects and components.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionContractException
    The class ConnectionContractException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when a condition violation occurs between a required component interface and an offered one.
    ConnectionPostconditionException
    The class ConnectionPostconditionException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when a connection postcondition violation occurs between a required component interface and an offered one.
    ConnectionPreconditionException
    The class ConnectionPreconditionException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when a connection precondition violation occurs between a required component interface and an offered one.
    ContractException
    The class ContractException defines the most general exception related to software contracts (in the sense of Eiffel): preconditions, postconditions, invariants, etc.
    ImplementationContractException
    The class ImplementationContractException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when an implementation condition violation occurs about the internal implementation of a component.
    ImplementationInvariantException
    The class ImplementationInvariantException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when an implementation invariant violation occurs about the internal implementation of a component.
    ImplementationPostconditionException
    The class ImplementationPostconditionException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when an implementation postcondition violation occurs about the internal implementation of a component.
    ImplementationPreconditionException
    The class ImplementationPreconditionException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when an implementation precondition violation occurs about the internal implementation of a component.
    InvariantException
    The class InvariantException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when an invariant violation occurs in a component.
    PostconditionException
    The class PostconditionException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when a postcondition violation occurs in a component.
    PreconditionException
    The class PreconditionException defines the exception type which instances are thrown when a precondition violation occurs in a component.
    VerboseException
    The class ContractException defines exceptions which leaves a trace on the out stream when raised.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.exceptions Description

Contract-oriented exceptions.

The fact that you are presently reading this means that you have had knowledge of the CeCILL-C license and that you accept its terms.

This package introduces exceptions thrown when a contract is not ensured i.e., precondition, postcondition or invariant violation.
